column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Having visited Chicago on numerous occasions for conferences
column2: I finally decided to visit the AIoC
column4: I cannot believe that I waited so long to take the time out from the conference life to visit this amazing world class collection of art. On my first visit
column5: I took care of the tickets online
column6: which I highly recommend as it saves you significant time as you can bypass the ticket line at the museum. Also
column7: the free pamphlet provided by AIoC is super useful
column8: it provides a list of must see artwork
column9: which I used as a treasure hunt of sorts that took me throughout the various sections. If you get lost (which is easy to do in this complex of adjacent buildings)
column10: ask for help (I did so on several occasions and each person was friendly in giving me directions. Spent 3-4 hours here
column11: and would love to go back. Must see.
